entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 19 except 14 near Lake Erie. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this morning. High 19 except 14 near Lake Erie. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 07:02 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: A few showers. Low 9.
